application

Class MainTextController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.MainTextController

  • public class MainTextController
extends java.lang.Object
    The class provides a link between the MainTextStatistics interface methods implemented in AbstractDocument and the user interface
    Author:
    Elena Khasanova
